pages.title: Salt and Salty Sand
pages.text: If you explore your world for a while, you may find patches of salty sand on beaches. Salty sand is found on beaches and in oceans, generating in sand. When mined, it drops salt rock, which can be crafted into usable salt.

pages.title: Salt Pools
pages.text: If you prefer not to live near a beach, you may find a salt pool. These shallow, light blue pools of water are surrounded by salty sand, and you can even generate salt with a Redstone Desalinator in these pools - no need for an ocean. The salty rocks that make up the pool cannot be obtained, meaning you can't move this source of salt.
